this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches chain chain single_crochet single_crochet inv decrease invisible decrease tools and materials - 5 mm crochet hook - bernat premium #4 worsted medium yarn - orange and green - yarn needle - stitch marker - stuffing - scissors final size - the diameter is 5 cm and height is 3 5 cm technical notes *the pumpkin is worked in spirals so use a stitch marker to indicate the start of a round *at the end of each round/row is a stitch count in brackets *stitch count does not include chains *link to the youtube video is at the bottom of the pattern pumpkin orange round 1 make a magic_ring into the magic_ring make 6 single_crochet 6 sts round 2 make 2 single_crochet in each st around 12 sts round 3 make 2 single_crochet in the first st followed by 1 single_crochet in the next st repeat around 18 sts round 4-7 make 1 single_crochet in each st around 18 sts round 8 make 1 single_crochet inv decrease followed by 1 single_crochet in the next st repeat around 12 sts round 9 make 6 single_crochet inv decrease 6 sts stuff fasten_off filp over wrap pull tight repeat going up and leave a 60 cm the yarn around and down through yarn tail the side and pull the pumpkin to the yarn needle make the bumps into the pumpkin to the other side pull tight and tie a pull the yarn into it should look like flip over and use knot cut the yarn the pumpkin this this side as the top tail to be about 1-2 of the pumpkin cm stem green row 1 chain 3 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 single_crochet in each chain across 2 sts *fasten_off and leave a 10 cm yarn tail to sew the stem to the pumpkin link to video https //youtu be/t9bv8fkvuog if you need help or have any questions feel free to message me i will respond as soon as possible and answer or clarify any questions you may have
